title: Portfolio Website
description: A responsive personal portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features a dark theme with red accents and smooth animations.

title: Temo - Emotion-Based Drone Interaction
description: An innovative project integrating facial emotion recognition with a DJI Tello drone. Temo interprets human facial expressions to control drone behavior, creating an interactive and responsive aerial experience. Using the ROS2 Tello wrapper developed by the SNT-ARG Team from the University of Luxembourg.

title: RPI2-FreeRTOS-CAN-BUS
description: Extended FreeRTOS implementation for Raspberry Pi 2 with CAN BUS communication capabilities. Features include SPI drivers, MCP2515 controller support, and TACLEBENCH integration for embedded systems benchmarking.

title: Website for the ASBL Alma Da Beira Alta
description: The Alma Da Beira Alta website is developed for a non-profit organization dedicated to preserving Portuguese folklore. It provides information about the group's mission, upcoming events, and ways to get involved. Built with modern web technologies, the site ensures a responsive and user-friendly experience. A custom CMS, developed with React and Firebase, allows administrators to manage website content effortlessly. Additionally, they can track finances and event registrations through the platform.
